story-context.acceptanceCriteria:
**Given** users need transparency about the site (FR98) **When** a user navigates to /about or clicks About link **Then** an informative About page is displayed with all required content sections **And** automated tests exist covering main functionality
### 7 Content Sections 1. What Is This? Community-driven tracker, real community sentiment, anonymous participation 2. Why This Exists: Rockstar delay skepticism, no existing tools, gap in sentiment tracking 3. How It Works: Anonymous submission, weighted median, community consensus, sharing 4. The Algorithm (Transparency): Weighted median (1.0 / 0.3 / 0.1 weights), troll mitigation explained 5. Privacy & Data: IP hashing, cookie usage, no personal data, link to Privacy Policy 6. Who Made This: Creator info, fan-made emphasis, contact email 7. Open Source / Transparency: GitHub link, transparency commitment
### Tone and Formatting - Conversational, friendly, not corporate - Honest about limitations - Builds trust through transparency - Mobile-responsive design - Links from main navigation and footer
### Testing Requirements - Unit tests for page route and accessibility - Test all 7 sections present - Test Privacy Policy link works - Test mobile responsiveness
